channel.title: Four Short and Simple Questions
channel.description:
[s]1) How do I raise The Prices of an item?[/s]
2) How do i make it so that, when you right click some one, it says Ban "nick" or Kick "nick"
3) When i use the command ::kickuser "nick" It says you succesfully kicker "ser" "nick", and the person does not get kicked, anyone know how to fix this?
4) I spawned a santa, and got him to say "Buy Your Rares Here" but, HOW do I get him to sell the rares?
Thanks :)

Goto the huuge list of tuorials. Ctrl-F “shop” theres a whole guide on doing it. It would help
